about_the_game:
FEATURES


  • Farming Simulation like never before
  • Plant and harvest with a whole array of weapons, instead of traditional farming equipment
  • Contract system, trucks come to your farm with an order
  • As you complete contracts, they'll get more complex and you'll unlock more advanced weaponry

You have been contracted by the United States government to gather food to feed the soldiers in the current war effort. However, the yields they’re asking for are astronomical! Luckily, the President is a sensible man and decides to help you out: by giving you weapons directly from the military’s arsenal itself! Rapidly plant and harvest seeds via drone strike, accurately reap and sow from the guns of a Blackberryhawk, and even man the guns of the famous Air Cropper 130!

Your efforts will not go unnoticed. The more crops you gather, the better the equipment!

Saddle up, grab your Machine gun, and get planting!
